text: Alexander Alexandrovich Maysuryan (; b. June 15, 1969 in Moscow) is a Russian author and political activist.Актуальні проблеми вітчизняної юриспруденції № 5/2015 (in Ukrainian)https://www.tvc.ru/channel/brand/id/2494/show/description He is a journalist, and the author of books on history and biology. ==Personal Life and Education== He is of Armenian origin. Alexander Maysuryan is a distant relative of Alexander Atabekian. He studied at Moscow State University's Faculty of Biology. For 1987—1989 he lived in Murmansk Oblast. Now he is called a Moscow blogger.https://mosmonitor.ru/blogs/History/den_vyishivanki Boris Stomakhin corresponded with him.http://ipvnews.org/stomakhin/stomakhin_letters.pdf Maysuryan is a Marxist.https://forum-msk.org/material/news/9850261.html ==Career== Alexander Maysuryan is a political journalist. He is a member of the Democratic Union.https://www.kavkaz-uzel.eu/articles/131457/ He also is a human rights activist,https://www.kavkaz- uzel.eu/articles/131457/http://www.nmc-lunc.ru/n14.htm and a blogger (at LiveJournal, listed in the Top 100 bloggers)https://graniru.org/Politics/Russia/Politzeki/m.238138.htmlhttps://ast- news.ru/node/ideya-pereimenovaniya-ulits-v-astrakhani-ne-ostavilo-lyudey- ravnodushnymi/.http://gefter.ru/archive/23548 Maysuryan starred in documentaries as a writer.https://www.tvc.ru/channel/brand/id/2580/show/descriptionhttps://www.tvc.ru/channel/brand/id/2527/show/descriptionhttps://www.tvc.ru/channel/brand/id/2494/show/description He is the editor of The Encyclopedia for Children (Аванта +, 1994).http://scjournal.ru/articles/issn_1997-292X_2017_2_58.pdf#page=2 He is the author of books including "Развитие в природе, культуре и истории : исслед. в форме диалогов" (Клуб XXI в., 2000, 384 p., ). He is a biographer of Lenin and Brezhnev. He worked in a museum for over ten years. ==References== ==External links== * Official site (in Russian) * Official Maysuryan Blog Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Russian historians Category:Russian human rights activists Category:Russian political activists Category:Russian journalists Category:Opinion journalists Category:Russian anti-war activists Category:Russian Marxists Category:Russian bloggers Category:Russian writers Category:21st-century Russian writers Category:21st- century Russian journalists Category:21st-century Russian historians
title: Alexander Maysuryan
